data.name: NewGenGamingV2
data.description:
Presale (DxSale) launch in 23/05/2021 by the team based in Germany, NewGG is a token that combines games with crypto like NFT minting, VR NFTs and Online Gaming where the user can farm tokens.

The team is very fascinated by the current possibilities of gaming combined with crypto currencies.
With their developing background in the gaming and sensor scene they believe they can make something better with this community.

The plan is to get this token and idea out to the world and create smartphone games / browser games where you can farm NewGG tokens (out of our marketing wallet) and mint NFTs.

Our next step includes a NewGG App where you can easily see your achievements, farming results and staking based on the games you played.

The overall vision includes a massive multiplayer game where you can use your NewGG as an ingame currency, stake them, buy or sell things of your player. Creating or joining guilds where you can create your own crypto token within the NewGG ecosystem in game.
